attributes.action: Increase Funding For The Development Of Alternative Energy Sources, Not Just Wind Power
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I would like to see more money being invested in anything but wind power which to be frank generates a pathetic ammount of energy. sources such as tidal power, solar power have not been fully investigated and may have masive potential, also Fusion power could be a MASIVE power source

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
